entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
